name: Kamikaze Gophers
description:
TK Game Jam 2016 Submission. Theme - 10 Seconds.

Imagine a world torn by a war. A world in which superior Gopher forces are trying to submit the rest of the planet in a daring assault.

Only you and your friend can resist their final attack. Unfortunately your primitive technology only allows your gyro-turrets to shoot 10 seconds before they overheat.

Team:

Art: Natalia Słomowicz

Programming: Grzegorz Górski
